activities: Xand Operations is a data center, co-location and cloud service provider. We maintain a secure environment based on NIST, PCI-DSS and HIPAA standards and best practices. Our client base is mostly domestic but many of those domestic clients have international offices and operation that may transmit data to their secure environments within our data centers. All personal data received under the Safe Harbor mandate is securely transmitted, stored and never shared, retransmitted nor unencrypted by Xand.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: all data is processed by our third party clients and includes clinical trial data and customer information. No manually processed data.
privacyprograms: Payment Card Industry, HIPAA, GLBA, FISMA
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
